titleStmt.title: A short representation performed before the Lord Generall Monck. at Goldsmiths-hall, Tuesday, Aprill 11th. By three persons, an English-man, a Welsh-man, and a Scotch-man.
titleStmt.author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print show-through with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Wales.
